metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11684 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the functionincludeFile in compileTranslationTable.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2
liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2
liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2
python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblouis package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.2').
